channel.title: [PI] Why won't NPC drops work? Help me!
channel.description:
I got some advice from another Moparscape member on how to edit the NPC drops...
The only problem is, it doesn't work. A member from R-S told me that 0 means it drops 100% and 500 means it's super rare.
I tried adding a new NPC drop but for some reason it never drops, even when the rarity is set to 0.
Any advice? I really need to edit the drops on my server but nothing seems to be working.

item.title: [PI] Why won't NPC drops work? Help me!
item.dc:creator: @Amayzing Amayzing
item.description:
@Amayzing wrote:

Thanks everybody, I solved it.

Although, the fix wasn’t in any of the files like NPCDrops.tsm like everyone thought.

The drops were actually listed in config.java.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Why won't NPC drops work? Help me!

item.title: [PI] Why won't NPC drops work? Help me!
item.dc:creator: @Amayzing Amayzing
item.description:
@Amayzing wrote:

nicks:

hmm idk i don’t really use pi never really liked it its nice but to many people use it now. if i think of something else ill let you know

Uhm, alright, thanks.

Does anyone know? I’ve seen this problem posted on both Mopar and R-S but it seems to never get solved.

item.title: [PI] Why won't NPC drops work? Help me!
item.dc:creator: @Amayzing Amayzing
item.description:
@Amayzing wrote:

nicks:

i always thought the drop rate was like 1 = 1% 100 = 100%

Oh, it could be, I’m not sure. Either way, I tried both ways.

I set the man (NPC 1) drops to 100 and they still didn’t drop.

And I really need to get it working.
